name: Hacco
description: STEM Innovator and community volunteer, inspiring others through technology and service.

name: Alhaji Abdussalam Ibrahim
description: A unifying spiritual leader as Chief Imam, fostering peace and interfaith harmony in Ijebu-Ife’s diverse community and fostering community unity.

name: Dr Ademola Adenubi
description: An innovative entrepreneur whose leadership at Edutams Limited drives educational and economic growth in Ijebu-Ife. Innovator and community volunteer, inspiring others through technology and service.

name: Alhaji Akeem Agbaman
description: A committed community figure whose efforts as Agbaman uplift Ijebu-Ife’s cultural and social vitality.

name: Maryam Bello
description: Young entrepreneur and tech enthusiast, empowering girls in STEM fields.

name: Tunde Ajayi
description: Community organizer and environmental advocate, leading clean-up campaigns.

name: Blessing Eze
description: Literacy champion and peer educator, helping others achieve academic success.
